title: With the [Alchemy Box], Create, Enchant and Dominate! With a Box That Can Create Anything, Begin Building a New Life on a Deserted Island - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Romance
tags: Abandoned Children   Alchemy   Aristocracy   Award-winning Work   Beastkin   Carefree Protagonist   Cheats   Child Abuse   Clever Protagonist   Cooking   Crafting   Game Elements   Hard-Working Protagonist   Magic   Male Protagonist   Multiple POV   Nobles   Reincarnated in Another World   Reincarnation   Royalty   Siblings   S*aves   Survival   Tragic Past

description:
An Isekai World reincarnation.  With the [Alchemy BOX], CREATE and BUILD!  With a Beast Girl and other fluffy friends, live the Slow Life on a deserted Island!  The 2nd Dragon Novels New Generation Fantasy Novel Contest Special Awards Winner!
